item.title: BarCampBangkok's potential achievements?
item.description:
NOTE: Totally based on assumptions. Please comment to add more or remove/rectify false ones. BarCamp is an international network of user-generated conferences — open, participatory workshop-events, whose content is provided by participants — often focusing on early-stage web applications, and related open source technologies, social protocols, and open data formats. The event will be bilingual, in both English and Thai. January 26th, 2008 at Indus Restaurant, Bangkok BarCampBangkok Achievements :-
  • The first BarCamp in Thailand
  • The largest BarCamp in Asia - Expecting 200 participants.
  • The first BarCamp in Asia to be conducted at a restaurant.
  • The first BarCamp conducted in an Indian Restaurant.
  • 100% Sponsored - Participants do not pay if they don't wish to do so and go home with a free cool shirt.
  • Organized by the coolest people.
  • First item on Google News Search.
  • 177 people registered within 4 days!
